query:
SELECT p.id, p.title, p.`order`, COUNT(e.id) as num_exercises
FROM pages p
LEFT JOIN exercises e ON p.id = e.pageId
JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id
WHERE m.slug = 'porcentagem'
GROUP BY p.id
ORDER BY p.`order`

JOIN modules m ON p.moduleId = m.id
